attributes.action: resign for losing all the child benefit database.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We feel that the Prime Minister and his cabinet should resign due to its incompetence in allowing a situation to arise such that all the 25 million records from the child benefit database have been lost.
The ramifications of this loss could affect our children for many years to come due to the type of data that has been lost.
